name: First Heist
description:
Thieves and terrorists have stolen the money from bankville's bank, and now it's your job to stop them from getting away. Get to work soldier.

First Heist is a arcade-shooting game made for android. It tries to unravel the jazz theme with some pixel-arting and eager development, that results in a mostly simple, but fun experience.

By watching a add video you can write your bests scores on a local leaderboard. That way you can compete with your friends and make the most of the game.
